Package sailpoint.object

Interface PolicyExecutor

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractPolicyExecutor, BasePluginPolicyExecutor
    public interface PolicyExecutor
    The interface of a class that implements policies.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.util.List<PolicyViolation> evaluate​(SailPointContext context, Policy policy, Identity id)
      Most policies are applied to a particular Identity during an iteration managed by the Interrogator.
      void makeAlertable​(PolicyViolation policyViolation)
      Set alertable flag for the policy violation depending on type of the policy executor.
      void setSimulating​(boolean simulating)
      Is this a simulation (for example, links can be in memory and not in database).

    • Method Detail

      • evaluate

        java.util.List<PolicyViolation> evaluate​(SailPointContext context,
                                         Policy policy,
                                         Identity id)
                                  throws GeneralException
        Most policies are applied to a particular Identity during an iteration managed by the Interrogator. A context is provided so the executor can examine other objects.
        Throws:
        GeneralException

      • setSimulating

        void setSimulating​(boolean simulating)
        Is this a simulation (for example, links can be in memory and not in database).

      • makeAlertable

        void makeAlertable​(PolicyViolation policyViolation)
        Set alertable flag for the policy violation depending on type of the policy executor.
